dcterms:creator: J. Schulman
S. Levine
P. Moritz
M. I. Jordan
E. D. Abbeel
dcterms:description: A control system where a pole is connected through an un-actuated joint to a cart, which moves along a frictionless track. The goal is to prevent the pole from falling over by applying forces to the cart.
dcterms:title: Cart-Pole system

dcterms:creator: J. Schulman
S. Levine
P. Moritz
M. I. Jordan
E. D. Abbeel
dcterms:description: A method for estimating advantages in reinforcement learning that helps improve policy optimization by reducing variance in the estimates.
dcterms:title: Generalized Advantage Estimation (GAE)

dcterms:creator: R. Amit
R. Meir
K. Ciosek
dcterms:description: A learning method that incorporates a discount factor as a regularizer to improve the performance of reinforcement learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: TD2 Learning

dcterms:creator: S. Kullback
R. Leibler
dcterms:description: A general mention of various reinforcement learning environments used for experimentation and evaluation of algorithms.
dcterms:title: Reinforcement Learning (RL) environments
